Title: Relates to the provision of wireless communication services; repealer
Summary: Relates to the provision of wireless communication services; places the public service commission in control of the wireless communications services industry within the state of New York.
LawCode: Rpld §5 sub 6, §92-h, add Art 12 §§250 - 265, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the provision of wireless communication services; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
